name: Breakthru 2D
description:
Welcome to Breakthru, a super casual 2D arcade-style game!

Controls:

On PC:

- Right arrow to rotate clockwise (CW)

- Left arrow to rotate counter-clockwise (CCW)

On Mobile:

- tap the right half of the screen to rotate clockwise (CW)

- tap the left half of the screen to rotate counter-clockwise (CCW)
